underlying_goal: Condense the 'limitations' and 'conclusion' sections of a research paper to help meet an 8-page limit.
primary_success: Successfully condensing the 'limitations' and 'conclusion' sections by approximately 40% while retaining their core messages.
brief_summary: To help meet an 8-page limit, the user asked to shorten the limitations and conclusion sections. Claude analyzed the existing text, then rewrote and merged paragraphs to make both sections more concise, cutting about 40% of the text. The paper was then recompiled.
